p: Siddha medicine is widely used in Southern India, which prescribes a concoction called Kabasura kudineer chooranam for cold, cough, and fever ( Kiran et al., 2020). Molecular docking studies were performed for 32 phytochemical constituents of herbs present in Kabasura kudineer chooranam and 05 phytochemical constituents of herbal formulation named JACOM against spike protein (S) of SARS-CoV-2 (PDB ID: 6VSB) to observe the molecular interactions between target protein and ligands. All the phytochemical analogs were successfully docked with S protein of SARS-CoV-2 ( Kiran et al., 2020; Table 1).
